Reviews.Title: LG VX8560 Chocolate Phone Review
Reviews.Author: Graywolf
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone to replace an identical one that I had used for four years. I am old school so I only needed a phone with a camera, voice mail, and occasional texting.  This phone is exactly what I had before and I am happy with the vendor. The phone came with a 110 volt charger for about $50. I have purchased a replacement OEM battery for about $6.00 at Amazon. This flip-phone has a calendar, calculator, alarms (3), and you can download music. The main display is much larger than the outside display. There is a Micro-SD slot for storing photos and music.

Reviews.Title: it's only a phone
Reviews.Author: L. Holliday
Reviews.Content: i loved my lg chocolate flip phone and when it broke i sought to replace it. no longer available through verizon, i found a new one through a top seller at amazon. shipped fast and in brand new condition. however.. upon activation i learned that the software for this model is no longer supported by verizon. i am not able to utilize mobile web, transfer phone numbers, download ringtones or music.in short.. it is just a phone (with the annoying ringtones verizon installs).my advice would be to check with your carrier regarding a discontinued model before replacing an old favorite.

Reviews.Title: REFURBISHED from Dealscaly
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This phone is advertised as NEW, i have been in the cell phone industry for a few years and i know that by legal terms that "new" has to be actually new.  A returned or refurbished item is not NEW!! DO NOT BUY..........Phone is defective, shuts off by pressing any button on the outside,  Dirt and crud throughout.  No rubber covers on ANY of the screws anymore.  Telltale sign of a refurb. JUNK JUNK JUNK, awaiting return label and then REFUND!  Fortunately it was fulfilled by Amazon and not the seller so the return shall be hassle free.  Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Good looking phone, works nicely
Reviews.Author: Cindy Cahill
Reviews.Content: Smooth on the outside. Not requiring a data plan but having nice qualities like nice ringtone, nice looks and smooth surface make it a nice phone to have.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Max Lyon
Reviews.Content: I've had the Chocolate 3 for quite a while.  I text and call all the time so I don't really need a smartphone, and for that it's perfect!  Extremely reliable and durable, lots of great features like the mp3 player and fm transmitter.  Such a great phone!

Reviews.Title: LG Chocolate Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: The seller was excellent in his quick response to replacing the initially defective phone. No excuses or runarounds, just a promise to send a new phone, with a prepaid envelope to return the defective phone.I purchased this phone for my wife because she had significant difficulty with her Samsung Brightside, which required 4 replacements & still did not work correctly. She did not purchase the Brightside from this seller. Her "Chocolate" was her favorite phone & gave her zero problems, it just died. LG no longer makes this basic phone available for people who do not want to use smartphones or just do not have the technical capability of mastering apps, touch screens & other functions.It is great to know that someone has enough of these phones available for people like my wife. It is also great to know that the seller is ethical, quick to respond & resolve any issues that may arise.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, Great Service
Reviews.Author: Darrin Leblanc
Reviews.Content: This phone was purchased as a replacement for the same model which my son managed to accidentally wash. We went and looked at new phones but honestly the currently flip models don't begin to compare to this older but better model. Most of us realize that everyone is sort of expected to have a smart phone these days however, this phone is plenty smart enough for a high school aged boy who does not need to receive email or be on FB 24/7.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: The seller sold me a 'new' phone.The phone primary and secondary settings were locked on the 'new' phone. I contacted the seller. Logically, if the settings are locked, the phone is not new and is used. The seller agreed to send me another phone, but a used one, for the same price of the 'new' one. He wanted me to pay for the used one, first, again. That was not proper customer service. He made an error, he was not honest about the phone status, and he should have simply sent the darn used phone and waited for me to mail the supposed 'new' phone back---not to mention I was paying for my own shipping to return the broken 'new' phone he sent.Amazon assisted me with obtaining a refund. He was just horrible and not honest.I had all my emails as proof, AND he sends a flyer in his packages asking you to call him via telephone first if there is a problem with the order and to please avoid contacting Amazon, first. I wonder why...

Reviews.Title: LG Chocolate 3
Reviews.Author: Bond
Reviews.Content: I just received mine. It was easy to activate and transfer from my old phone except the contacts. There was no way to transfer them without going to a store and have them do it. I bought a used one. It is scratched up pretty bad but seems to work ok so far.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRICE
Reviews.Author: jhparts
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife who does not text or e-mail just wanted a simple phone . It did the job and she is very happy.This was a cheaper way of get her a replacement phone then going through Verizon which wanted more money and a activation fee if I bought the phone from them . The phone coost me less then the activation fee delivered to my home :o)

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: Julie Bell
Reviews.Content: I replaced another LG Chocolate and I love it!  Hate change so this one works great for me!!  Don't need a smart phone, this one does everything I need it to do!!

Reviews.Title: Great Item and Great Company!!
Reviews.Author: A.dizzle
Reviews.Content: At first when I recieved the product I didn't get a battery. I emailed the company and 5 minutes later they emailed me back with an apology and they put it in first calss mail and included a free car charger the next day!

Reviews.Title: Kewl
Reviews.Author: Alex Luevano
Reviews.Content: Works great and has not malfunctioned at all, it is a secure buy, go ahead and do it already. End.

Reviews.Title: My husband wanted a no-frills phone
Reviews.Author: J. Dughman "J. Dughman"
Reviews.Content: And that's exactly what I got.  My husband has had this phone forever.  When his cracked and plain wore out he asked me to order the exact same thing.  It's perfect for him.

Reviews.Title: Cheap phone.
Reviews.Author: Galina Kalininskaya
Reviews.Content: The phone look cheap. I had the same before this came in and it was metal, this one is rubber, plastic. It turning himself off all the time, because It very tight between cover and dial pad. I needed to improve it by inserting something in between. This phone is for my mother, but I will look for different one.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!!!
Reviews.Author: Joan Fay
Reviews.Content: This phone is just right for my husband.  He loves it. All he wanted was a phone to get and make calls!!!

Reviews.Title: Replaced my LG Chocolate 3
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Stevens "Thumb33"
Reviews.Content: I loved my LG3, it has a stereo MP3 player and every thing I needed. Verizon in their greed has a very limited selection of simple phones to choose from. They want you to purchase a smart phone and double you bill. I was happy to find I could replace my LG3 for a reasonable price. Although the phone wasn't perfect (bit of chrome flaked off the side) it operates perfectly and that is all I wanted. I would not hesitate to purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Timely but no charger included.
Reviews.Author: Beaumontman
Reviews.Content: Arrived as promised and quality item but did not have a charger with it as I think itindicated. Had to buy one at Best Buy for more than the phone cost.

Reviews.Title: We took a chance and came up short....
Reviews.Author: tdaiu6152
Reviews.Content: As this turned out we had a defect within the phone.  The vendor was good about accepting it back for a refund.  Very quick customer service.  It's not unusual to have this happen with electronics today.  It just happens

Reviews.Title: Not what we thought it would be
Reviews.Author: Walt
Reviews.Content: The seller did not rate this as poor or blemished or anything. It only stated that the phone was 100% checked. We assumed that this was in fair shape similar to ones received over EBAY. EBAY sellers rate the looks, poor, blemished, etc.This phone works 100% but looks like it went through the war. Very displeased on the condition.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Faeth
Reviews.Content: great phone so far. I have ordered extended battery for it. holds charge good on both batteries. takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Felicia
Reviews.Content: I had an Ice Blue Choc 3 phone but it started malfunctioning so I bought this one. I thought it would be gray like it says in the description but the one I was sent is a very dark navy blue. I cannot complain b/c it is beautiful and It's my favorite color anyway. I don't want to return it it's mine now. It is brand new and works great! I don't think I'll buy any other phone. Love the programmable FM radio transmitter on it.Not sure why other commenters on here said that Verizon does not support this phone anymore. I just activated mine 2 days ago online with no problem at all.

Reviews.Title: Great condition as described.
Reviews.Author: Ruth A Lester
Reviews.Content: I loved my old Chocolate, so when my son sent his new phone through the washer, I thought that this would be a great replacement phone for him. It was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Husbands Phone
Reviews.Author: Doris J. Young "Love Movies"
Reviews.Content: My husband loves this phone. He is not into texting but just wants something he can call out and receive calls on.  The performance is excellent.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Cass
Reviews.Content: The phone was exactly as promised. Shipping was kind of slow. Also the first time my son dropped it the front cover came off so now it's taped on. I don't know if that's normal for this kind of phone or  it.

Reviews.Title: Great flip phone!
Reviews.Author: Thor
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone for a flip phone! I have had 3 different ones over the years and loved them. Tons of features for an old school flip phone. Really the cadillac of old school!

Reviews.Title: very happy with the quick delivery and function of this little phone
Reviews.Author: Patti Morgan
Reviews.Content: Had to use this as a back up phone and it's great. I love the large screen and is easy to use. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Nate Baron
Reviews.Content: Had to give up my smartphone due to billing. Those bad boys can get expensive. Got two of these LG's. Not bad for a basic phone. Got an FM transmitter built in so you can play your music through your car stereo. SOLD!

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: Mahuizoh
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my father. This one took a bit of getting used to RE: different color scheme (Grey inside, & background lighting). Works just fine no problems at all and even better he received and extra battery!!

Reviews.Title: Lg. Vx8960 Grey Chocolate 3 Cell phone.
Reviews.Author: Donna-Lynne Jordan
Reviews.Content: This is not a fake response, I am a real person, who to wonders about public comments. HOWEVER, this company did pull through with flying colors. I don't want a gadget that does everything, I have a desk top for that. I am NOT a texter, I'm of the age of conversing on the phone. But I love the cam/video feature, and have texting just to upload it on my computer. The picture quality is great. The description it has a few scratches from use. NONE were detected, so they really make sure their incoming items are up to par, and their out going products are superior second hand. 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Very nice looking phone. Very little wear and works just fine. Good price and was just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the Price
Reviews.Author: RL#1
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for a current phone.  Although refurbished it works pretty good and could not beat the price since it came with all of the chargers and adapters.

Reviews.Title: Chocolate 3 Phone replacement
Reviews.Author: Albert J Fritsch
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to replace an old Chocolate phone I had used for three years that finally gave up the ghost.  I gave it to my partner since he is old school and only needed the phone and camera.  He was using the old one that died on us and loved the old one and when I saw this one I jumped on it.  When it arrived, and it came quickly, it looked like a brand new phone.  The seller was very prompt in answering a pre sale question and delivered the product as promised.  What a great looking and perfectly functioning phone!

Reviews.Title: Scratched, dirty, does not even come from who it says it does. DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Olejniczak
Reviews.Content: i got this phone and there was a pile of dirt underneath the screen that was so bad that it looked like the phone wasnt touched in 10 years, the screen had a nick on it and the phone was in overall shotty condition. the company told me to go through amazon for a return then amazon told me to go through them. after the run around i decided im not going to exchange this phone im just going to return it and be done with this company.. HASSLE OF A LIFE TIME DEFF  NOT WORTH THE TROUBLE.

Reviews.Title: In with the old...
Reviews.Author: Mandoc
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to find a Verizon Chocolate cell phone.  It was a Christmas gift for my boyfriend, who's old LG VX8560 was about to go kaput.  It was delivered promptly and works really well.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: eric hall
Reviews.Content: it stopped working the day I got it the screen went out as soon as I turned it on and it keeps turning off

Reviews.Title: Buy a Real Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Bob A. Gabbert "Bob"
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted only a basic cell phone with none of the frills, not even a camera, so when she lost her old cell phone, we bought this one, because it looked exactly the same as her old one. Big mistake. LG has tried to make what used to be a simple phone do everything a smart phone does. Consequently, for example, to check Missed Calls, one must wade through 5 menus to get there. You have to wade through menu after menu to do just about anything, and since it's not a smart phone, that means pressing tiny buttons that are easily done wrong.I use an iPhone, and it's far easier to use than this phone is, because they're trying to make an old hog do what a new smart phone does, and the implementation is terrible.Not only that, but the face covering the front of the phone, the part that covers the camera, etc. fell off less than a month after we bought it. Now it's held on by Scotch tape.Do the smart thing, buy a real smart phone rather than this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Best cell phone
Reviews.Author: James D
Reviews.Content: When I lost my Vx8560 Chocolate in the Atlantic ocean I had a difficult time finding a replacement, nothing out there compares to this phone.

Reviews.Title: choclate Phn
Reviews.Author: KEITH MILLER
Reviews.Content: All went well product was new as said but batt was not any good,so i called and they sent me another batt right away and all is well

Reviews.Title: Not worth 2 cents!
Reviews.Author: Screech.Nelson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my fiance to replace an old Chocolate that she loved. What a piece of junk! Refurbished? Probably refurbished by a 5 year old. The front has already fallen off, the case is already coming apart, and the buttons are already failing.Don't waste your money.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
The LG Chocolate 3 VX-8560 is a successor to the Chocolate 2 and switches to a clamshell flip-phone design.
The VX-8560 comes with a FM transmitter, MP3 music player, standard 3.5mm headphone jack and a 2 megapixel camera.
Other key features of the phone include a spinning scroll wheel for easy navigation, high-resolution QVGA display, Bluetooth compatibility, 3G EVDO high-speed data and a microSD slot for additional storage.
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon Lg Vx8560 Grey Chocolate 3 Cell Phone
